message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,500. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
